name: Doomsday Fodder (Prologue)
description:
Get yourself a Hero Squad and survive huge waves of enemies, trying to break the game with mindful choices. DOOMSDAY FODDER combines rogue-lite, autochess, bullet-hell and survival elements in a unique blend of action and strategy.

 squad of heroes to fight monsters to win planet back.


DOOMSDAY FODDER is a SURVIVAL ROGUELITE. Your main objective is to build a squad and survive 20 waves of increasing difficulty.



Main Features:
👉 Up to 40 unique heroes to build your squad, each with his own upgrade tree
👉 Synergies
👉 Mindful CHOICES for each of your run
👉 Quick to play and finish in less than 30 minutes
👉 One more run please feeling
👉 Dozens of Guns and Skills to alter the way your squad behaves
👉 Pure fun
